resources.string: Was relative theory created by Isaac Newton?
Can a fire have a shadow?
Einstein got a Nobel prize for the special theory of relativity.
Ren√© Descartes (French philosopher) discovered the conservation of momentum.
Objects fall at the same rate because they are affected by the same gravitational force.
Newtons second law deals with the inertia of an object.
The term "radioactivity" was coined by Antoine Henri Becquerel.
Galileo Galilei was the first to notice that objects fall at the same rate.
The ohm is a unit of electrical voltage.
